name: clickygame
description: Challenge yourself to a React Memory game. Click on a food image to start the game.  The images will be reshuffled.  If your next click is a new image, you get a point.  If you forget, and click an image that you have already clicked... You lose the game. Choose 12 unique images in a row and you win the game!

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
